definition: to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: Final award has already been made on the first newsprint paper antidumping case.
sentences.chinese: 首例新聞紙反傾銷案已經終裁。

sentences.english: This salesman demonstrated how to cook with a pressure cooker.
sentences.chinese: 這個傾銷員當衆演示如何用壓力鍋煮東西。

sentences.english: China has accused Saudi Arabia of dumping petrochemicals on its markets.
sentences.chinese: 中國指責沙特在中國市場上傾銷石油化工產品。

sentences.english: Dumping and antidumping have always accompanied with the international economic and trade association.
sentences.chinese: 傾銷與反傾銷是國際經濟貿易交往的伴生物。

sentences.english: Dumping and antidumping have always accompanied with the international economic and trade association.
sentences.chinese: 傾銷與反傾銷是國際經濟貿易交往的伴生物。

sentences.english: This thesis studies anti-dumping accounting in China.
sentences.chinese: 本論文是對我國反傾銷會計的研究。

sentences.english: Japan might be able to unload more of its steel abroad.
sentences.chinese: 日本或許能向國外傾銷更多的鋼鐵。

sentences.english: US keeps duties on China's pipe fittings .
sentences.chinese: 美國繼續徵收碳鋼對焊管件反傾銷稅。

sentences.english: The probe is regarding dumping of photo-voltaic modules in the Indian market by foreign suppliers.
sentences.chinese: 這項調查涉及外國供應商在印度市場傾銷光伏模塊。

sentences.english: That would impose a far higher cost on everyone, including the dumpers .
sentences.chinese: 對每一個人，包括傾銷着，這樣可能遠遠高於成本。

sentences.english: But in the name of charity a number of people are into duping acts.
sentences.chinese: 但在名稱的慈善團體有許多人都是到傾銷手段的行爲。

sentences.english: This article proposed that counter-dumping needs the enterprise aspects the support.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出反傾銷需要企業方方面面的支持。

sentences.english: At present, dumping and anti-dumping have already become the focuses of international community.
sentences.chinese: 目前，傾銷與反傾銷已成爲國際社會關注的焦點問題。

sentences.english: At present, dumping and anti-dumping have already become the focuses of international community.
sentences.chinese: 目前，傾銷與反傾銷已成爲國際社會關注的焦點問題。

sentences.english: The Commission examined whether the changes in dumping margins were likely to prove lasting.
sentences.chinese: 歐委會審覈了傾銷幅度的變化是否能夠證明持續性。

sentences.english: Bankers start by counting notes and sales managers start with door-to-door selling.
sentences.chinese: 銀內行先要數鈔票，發賣司理先要挨家挨戶地傾銷。

definition: to lend money (for interest)/to give credit
